name: market for maize flour | maize flour | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20930/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'maize flour', in the geography of South Africa.;This dataset represents the transport of 1 kg of maize flour from the maize processing facility (mill) to the associated market. No losses are considered in this dataset.;The product 'maize flour' is from milled maize. Maize is an annual crop.

The activity starts at the mill gate.

The activity ends with the provision of maize flour at the associated market.
category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/106:Manufacture of grain mill products, starches and starch products/1061:Manufacture of grain mill products

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The production data represented in this dataset are based on SAGIS supply and demand data for the 2016/2017 marketing season (March to Feb) retrieved online. Reference(s): SAGIS (2017) Supply and Demand: Marketing Year March 2016 to February 2017, South African Grain Information Service. Available at: http://www.sagis.org.za/sd_marketing_year.html. (Accessed August 2017)
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The data represents the South African context.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The data are intended to reflect current equipment and processes in South Africa.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The data is primarily sourced from literature and statistics.

flow.name: maize flour
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/106:Manufacture of grain mill products, starches and starch products/1061:Manufacture of grain mill products

exchanges.description: Imports of maize flour for local consumption is considered negligible (0.04% in 2015/16) (SAGIS, 2016). The transport distance is calculated based on the breakdown of the wheat processing and consumption by province. See documentation for further information.
